entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 74 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 35.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
